price: Sema: Yeye ndiye aliye kutawanyeni katika ardhi, na kwake mtakusanywa.
arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
footnotes: Sema: Huyo ndiye aliye kutawanyeni katika ardhi, na kwake Yeye peke yake ndio mtarejea kwa ajili ya kukuhisabuni na kukulipeni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul huwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
